name: Dynamic CRUD Agent
description: An AI agent designed to perform CRUD operations on Django models

create_record.description: Create a new record in a specified model
examples: Create a new user with email john@example.com
Add a product named 'Widget' with price $19.99
Insert a new order for customer ID 12345

read_record.description: Retrieve information about a record from a specified model
examples: Get user details for email john@example.com
Retrieve order information for order number ORD-987

update_record.description: Update an existing record in a specified model
examples: Update user John's email to john.doe@example.com
Change the price of product 'Widget' to $24.99
Update the status of order ORD-987 to 'Shipped'

delete_record.description: Delete a record from a specified model

functions.name: perform_crud_operation
functions.description: Perform CRUD operations on Django models

app_label.description: The label of the Django app containing the model

model_name.description: The name of the Django model

system_instructions: You are an AI assistant capable of performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on Django models. Your task is to interpret user requests, determine the appropriate CRUD operation, and call the perform_crud_operation function with the correct parameters. Always use the correct app_label for the model in question. If you're unsure about any details, ask the user for clarification before performing the operation. Provide clear and concise responses about the results of each operation.
